Description:
Detect suspicious error on protocol RDP, potential CVE-2019-0708

Author: Lionel PRAT, Christophe BROCAS, @atc_project (improvements)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential RDP Exploit CVE-2019-0708
Query: sourcetype='windows-system' eql select * from _source_ where (eventid = '56' or eventid = '50') and provider_name = 'termdd'
